code:
def countSetBits(n): 
    i = 0
    while (1 << i) <= n: 
        i += 1
    i -= 1
    return i * (1 << (i - 1)) + (n - (1 << i) + 1) + countSetBits(n - (1 << i)) if n != 0 else 0 

n = 10
total_set_bits = countSetBits(n)
print(total_set_bits)
prompt: Count total set bits in all numbers from 1 to n yaz.
